alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:02PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Umatilla, east central Benton and southwestern Walla Walla Counties through 330 PM PDT... At 302 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holdman, or 17 miles north of Pendleton, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kennewick, Helix, Holdman, Wallula, Touchet, Finley, Burbank and Highland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
